data.message: Eminem will forever be the shit. He started from the bottom. Now he's way fricken above drake. Drake won't even be able to tear down the balcony that Eminem looks down at Drake from.

replies.message: Uhh he has always been above drake
Yeah. But what I'm getting at is from what he started from.
Pretty known fact drake is better bro
^^^^ Did you just say Drake is better???
Blake obviously on hallucinogens

Eminem borrowed drakes lines in many songs
Eminem admits he's a fan of drake and gets his inspiration from him
You guys don't even know hip hop
Thought it was a known fact drake wrote lose yourself for Eminem
Chill out everyone! He's both white trash and joking.
Blake needs to return to what he does best ; flipping burgers.

The irony of you saying he's white trash 😂 Em's fanbase is corny. You niggas don't know a thing about Hip-Hop, or about rap and its technicalities. Em a legend, no doubt. But y'all tend to discredit Drake's pen game.
Ruben Gutierrez....I'm just saying that Eminem towers over Drake. I'm not saying Drake is bad
Slow down Karate Kid
God some more fucking retards go slap y'all selves please fucking wheelchair queer lovers

Drake isn't shit and never will be shit not a single person can touch em and his lyrics or penmanship or whatever he is the best all around in the music industry. Only people that may have anything over him is the fab 4 the Beatles
Ruben Gutierrez lmao you mean his ghost writer pen game
Blake Mozina are you on crack lol Drake is better at sucking dick for cookies with no milk bitch
Kill all the Muslims bomb their homes
Ghost writer? Oh, you mean QM? Who was credited on the track? Don't be ignorant.
Blake Mozina you're like 15 years old... Hip hop started way before you were a twinkle in your daddy's eye. If you're telling me Drake is "Real" hip hop, you need to go back to bed.
I can tell there's a lot of young bucks in here. When I start hearing that Drake is "Real hip hop", I realize I'm on the kindergarten playground.
Ice cube is better than drake even after nwa
eminem is forward than drake. picture says it all.
You fucking idiots are the reason hip hop is almost dead.
Nice nod to Not Afraid with the tearing down the balcony line
NOT AFRAID REFERENCE!
Nice reference bruh. 👏👏👏
